questionTitle: The funeral will be ________, and only members of the dead man's family will attend .
Do you really believe ________ ghosts?
I enjoyed ________ her again after all this time.
I am sorry that I can't ________ your invitation.
When he was a boy, he was always willing to join in a ________ of football.
The next ________ of the committee will take place on Thursday.
Who ________ the boss tell him that?
His parents never allowed him ________.
I have absolutely no doubt ________ the innocence of the accused .
As James had distinctions in Chemistry and Biology in his Higher School Certificate Examination, I hoped to ________ one of these subjects at university.
The room was infested ________ cockroaches.
In my company only executives are eligible ________ share option schemes.
Johnny is simply blind ________ his own shortcomings.
John was born ________ two intelligent people.
He took a taxi ________ he wouldn't be late.
He went to a school which ________ good manners and self- discipline.
She ________ 20 pounds out of the bank every Monday.
The lost of a front tooth has left an unsightly ________ in her teeth.
The terms toad and frog refer to different animals belonging to different genuses, and careful students ________ the two.
Although the terms toad and frog refer to different animals belonging to different genuses, some students ________ the two.
